channel.title: Amazon on Irati Hurtado
channel.description: Recent content in Amazon on Irati Hurtado

item.title: Using Amazon Mechanical Turk to conduct linguistic research
item.description: As a linguist, I often need to find speakers from a particular country or region to gather data on how they say something. However, it can sometimes be difficult to find a large group of speakers from a region you have never been to. In those cases, Amazon Mechanical Turk can come in handy. In this blog post, I explain how you can start using this awesome tool for your linguistic research!
